mapper.select: SELECT f.id , f.title , f.content , f.reg_date , f.mod_date , f.hit , c.id AS c_id , c.name AS c_name , m.id AS m_id , m.username AS m_username , m.name AS m_name FROM free f, member m, category c WHERE f.id=#{id} and f.member_id=m.id and f.category_id=c.id AND del_flag=false
mapper.update: UPDATE free SET hit=hit+1 WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
UPDATE free SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, mod_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
mapper.delete: UPDATE free SET del_flag=true WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
